enable_checker_only_saved.description: Turns on only calling the checker on the package being saved

enable_document_symbols.description: Turns on outline of all your global declarations in your document.

enable_hover_struct_size_info.description: Enables struct size and alignment information in hover.

enable_inlay_hints_params.description: Turn on inlay hints for (non-default) parameters.

enable_inlay_hints_default_params.description: Turn on inlay hints for default parameters.

enable_inlay_hints_implicit_return.description: Turn on inlay hints for implicit return values.

enable_procedure_snippet.description: Use snippets when completing proceduresâ€”adds parenthesis after the name.

enable_auto_import.description: Automatically import packages that aren't in your import on completion

enable_references.description: Turns on finding references for a symbol.

enable_document_highlights.description: Turns on highlighting of symbol references in file.

enable_completion_matching.description: Attempt to match types and pointers when passing arguments to procedures.

verbose.description: Logs warnings instead of just errors.

odin_command.description: Specify the location to your Odin executable, rather than relying on the environment path.

odin_root_override.description: Allows you to specify a custom `ODIN_ROOT` that `ols` will use to look for `odin` core libraries when implementing custom runtimes.

profiles.description: List of different profiles that describe the environment ols is running under.

os.description: The operating system for the profile.

checker_path.description: List of paths where to run the checker.

exclude_path.description: List of paths that will be excluded from workspace symbol searches.
